comment._content: Bostock & Wombwell's menagerie on the road. There is an elephant at the side of the camel pulling the truck.

comment.author: 76022657@N04
comment._content:
Bostock & Wombwell's Menagerie on the Great North Road, Tyneside 1913 - Alex Feely (brother of Arthur Feely) walking nearest to the lens.
Geoffrey Younger
